summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FlexCard after recent updates. All 20 backend tests pass. All frontend features working correctly including: user registration, login, dashboard, card activation modal, redirections, public profile with mobile-friendly social links, and VCF download.
passed_tests: API health check - FlexCard API v2.0.0 with Supabase database
POST /api/auth/login - Login with valid credentials works
GET /api/profile - Returns user profile with parsed emails/phones arrays
PUT /api/profile - Updates profile and persists changes
GET /api/links - Returns user links (empty for new user)
DELETE /api/links/{link_id} - Deletes link and verifies removal
GET /api/public/demo - Returns public profile with links
GET /api/analytics - Returns analytics data (views, clicks, contacts)
Test user login with provided credentials works
frontend_tests_passed: Registration form works and redirects to dashboard
Login form works and redirects to dashboard
GuestRoute: Logged in user accessing / redirects to /dashboard
GuestRoute: Logged in user accessing /login redirects to /dashboard
ProtectedRoute: Non-authenticated user accessing /dashboard redirects to /login
Dashboard overview tab loads with stats
Card activation modal appears when clicking 'Ma carte' without activated card
Card activation with valid code (ZQK5V) works

features_verified.inscription_nouvel_utilisateur: ✓ Working - Registration creates user and redirects to dashboard
features_verified.redirection_dashboard_si_connecte: ✓ Working - Logged in users accessing / are redirected to /dashboard
features_verified.redirection_login_si_non_connecte: ✓ Working - Non-authenticated users accessing /dashboard are redirected to /login
features_verified.popup_activation_carte: ✓ Working - Modal appears when clicking 'Ma carte' without activated card
features_verified.activation_carte_code_valide: ✓ Working - Card codes ZQK5V, 7ADUK, UVDQV are valid and unactivated
features_verified.profil_public_demo: ✓ Working - /u/demo accessible with profile and links
features_verified.liens_sociaux_mobile: ✓ Working - All links use <a> tags for mobile compatibility
features_verified.telechargement_vcf: ✓ Working - Save contact button triggers VCF download

seed_data_creation: Test users created during pytest execution
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features from the review request have been verified: 1) Registration and login work correctly, 2) Redirection logic works (GuestRoute redirects logged-in users to dashboard, ProtectedRoute redirects non-authenticated users to login), 3) Card activation modal appears when user without card clicks 'Ma carte', 4) Card codes ZQK5V, 7ADUK, UVDQV are valid and unactivated, 5) Public profile /u/demo works with mobile-friendly social links using <a> tags, 6) VCF download works. Database: Supabase PostgreSQL.
